title: I WANT PBE ACCESS
body: I have currently ahve no bans with honor lvl 5 and has never been dishonnered in all my account i would really like to give my opinion and access new things faster so i can share and plan for the future of the games and help with rito with some great ideas. I've tired to get the pbe account but the page keeps on telling me to refesh and try again because there is a problem with the page. is there a way to fix this or is it just not possible for other server people to access PBE?

replies.body: there really isnt any point in people on the oce server to go onto the pbe you will be playing with almost 300 pings so even if you got access to it, it will be unplayable.
Yep, I've tried it as I got PBE access years ago. It's extremely pointless to play on for us players stuck on the Oceanic server due to ping.
